item.description:
Welcome to Raw Spirit Fest East!

The Patuxent River 4-H Center is a lovely, secluded 74 acre park used for environmental education featuring verdant meadows surrounded by serene forests with trails to a hidden stream. Venture out on a short hike down to the gently flowing Patuxent River with wooded banks.

Saturday, August 29: 8 AM - Midnight
Sunday, August 30: 8 AM - Midnight

Registration Fees: $99 for a weekend pass; day passes and children's rates available.
Click Here to Register! www.rawspirit.com

What is included: A pass entitles participants to listen to leading edge dynamic speakers, phenomenal musicians, educational sessions on natural health, sacred exercise, meditation, poetry, dancing, creative children's program, raw demos (all day long!) and much more!

Meals and food: Available for purchase at a diverse variety of taste bud tantalizing raw restaurants in one of the world's largest raw restaurant courts. Fresh organic fruits and vegetables are available in the farmers market and delicious desserts and scrumptious smoothies from vendor booths throughout!

Children are Welcome: Bring your children to experience the creative and inspirational program provided each hour during the day and evening! Pre-school children need to be attended to by one parent at all times.

Thank you for your cooperation: This is a smoke-free, meat-free, alcohol-free, drug-free, pet-free and feel free event.
item.name: Raw Spirit Fest DC
